summary: When earthy Dolly Portland is rejected by Captain Gaskell in favor of a socialite, she aids Jamesy McCardle, in league with Malay pirates, in his plot to seize his ship.
cast: Clark Gable|Jean Harlow|Wallace Beery|Lewis Stone|Rosalind Russell|Dudley Digges|C. Aubrey Smith|Robert Benchley|William Henry|Liev De Maigret|Lilian Bond|Edward Brophy|Soo Yong|Carol Ann Beery|Akim Tamiroff|Ivan Lebedeff|Charles Coleman|Edward McWade|Daisy Belmore|Barlowe Borland|Harry C. Bradley|Emily Fitzroy|Pat Flaherty|Willie Fung|Chester Gan|Tom Gubbins|Sherry Hall|Sam Harris|Forrester Harvey|John Ince|Charles Irwin|Tetsu Komai|Eddie Lee|Richard Loo|Hattie McDaniel|Malcolm McGregor|Donald Meek|Ferdinand Munier|Beatrice Roberts|James Wang|Bobby Watson
title: Mares de China
